name: Airik the Cleric
description:
Ever wanted to play a video game with your eyes closed? This open world Zelda-style adventure can be played entirely without sight, but uses story-descriptive dialogue and real-time action and exploration to paint a memorable mental picture. The game is well received among blind gamers, and has become an audio game favorite in blind communities.

Story: Airik, a sightless Cleric warrior, is sent by his Chief to investigate some mysterious events. With the help of his small hilariously mouthy robot Scout, he must overcome an onslaught of mechanical minions and follow a trail leading to his own mysterious past.
